name: Color By Numbers for Unity
description:
Color By Numbers is a KillTimer, 2D pixel art coloring game. Choose from a variety of super fun images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Coloring has never been this easy!

Features:
- Currently have over 500+ pixel images.
- Perfect relaxing activity
- Zoom and pan the image
- Double click fill numbers
- Autosave your work to continue later
- Easy to add new image and reskin
- Code is clean and professional.
